welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Witney, the charming heart of the Cotswolds! Get ready to discover our quaint market town, known for its historic architecture, vibrant culture, and cozy pubs. We hope you enjoy your stay and soak up all the beauty our town has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport handles all commercial flights and features a range of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport is used exclusively by the Royal Air Force.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
